original_title: TSR Technologies receives USA Platinum Award for Most Emerging Company of the Year
original_body_lines: TSR Technologies Pvt Ltd, a leader in printing equipment and supplies, won the USA Platinum Award for Most Emerging Company of the year at the BWIO USA International Awards, organized by Business World International Organization. This gala event was held recently at Taj Samudra Hotel Colombo. Meanwhile, Roshan Rajapaksha, Chairman and CEO of TSR Technologies, recently won the Most Reliable Digital Printing Solution Partner award at CEO Sri Lanka award show.
